original_text: And the daughter of any priest, if she profane herself by playing the whore, she profaneth her father: she shall be burnt with fire.
korean_text: 어떤 제사장의 딸이든지 행음하여 자신을 속되게 하면 그의 아버지를 속되게 함이니 그를 불사를지니라

sentences.original_text: And the daughter of any priest
if she profane herself by playing the whore
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그녀가 창녀 놀이를 통해 자신을 더럽히면

sentences.original_text: she shall be burnt with fire.
